homepage.features.one.description.message: Wave yagenewe gufasha guhera ku gutunganya porogaramu zisaba ubushobozi buke kugeza ku gushyiraho porogaramu zisaba ubushobozi bwinshi, itanga ubwisanzure n'imikorere myiza mu rurimi rumwe.

homepage.features.two.description.message: Ukoresheje Wave, ushobora kwibanda ku gukemura ibibazo bigoye mu nzego zitandukanye nka web, ubwenge bw’ubukorano, na mudasobwa, ukoresheje ururimi rumwe.

homepage.features.three.description.message: Wave igufasha kwandika porogaramu zifite imikorere myiza kuri za mudasobwa zose, utangije umutekano n'uburyo bworoshye bwo kuyikoresha.
